item.title: Whitescape fixes / improvements
item.dc:creator: @Bill1 Bill_
item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

Features - more masks and things like faceplayer…

http://pastebin.com/w9xbLisw

-Logout fixes
-Allows you to ACTUALLY log in
-fixed X && Y 0 bug
-Player Loading and Saving!
-Saves experiance and which skill!

http://pastebin.com/Mn3Y7MGX

To explain:

  1. The first post just adds more player masks. Lets take example one:

if (Mask){ playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + MaskShield); } else */if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); } else { playerProps.writ

All it is doing is writing bytes. No need to explain because it’s just basic crap that the server does and you as a user doesn’t need to worry about. If a moderator feels the need, he/she will move it to snippets.

The second part overrides a few methods - including logging on - to remove anti-leeches and errors and fix them. Again basic.

Read full topic
